Name: Endustry
About the game: Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Defend your base with turrets ( Normal mode) or play casually without worrying about enemies ( Casual mode). Keep your base warm and avoid starving. Features: Casual mode ( No enemies or turrets) Normal mode ( Enemies and turrets) Survival elements Conveyor belts Resource management Randomly generated resources Turret upgrades Enemy waves
